March 26, 1937 D East Anglian BBA Spring Festival (Section 2)
East Anglian BBA Spring Festival (Section 2) 510 Test Piece Contest East Anglian BBA Spring Festival east-anglian-bba-section-2
None
Cambridge, Cambridgeshire, England, UK Brass Band News April 1937 shows result as - 1. Heacham, 2. Dereham, 3, New Buckenham., May edition states Heacham were later disqualified and that Wicken were second. (dutchy) 5 bands competed.
March 13, 2017, 9:47 a.m. Jan. 18, 2019, 11:06 a.m.
1 Dereham Band G. H. Slaughter
2 Wicken Coronation Band Unknown
3 New Buckenham Silver Band W. A. Emms
